data.name: Gone
data.detailed_description:
In this survival horror experience, you will find yourself lost in a dark and eerie forest. Gather coins, ammo, and weapons to fend yourself against the monsters that have swarmed the town while maintaining your sanity against the paranormal.

Use coins to pay for items in the shop system, various weapons to eliminate monsters, and med kits to keep yourself alive. Along your journey you will come across journal entries from townsfolk guiding you to complete essential tasks. This linear exploration is a mix of thrilling and engaging outdoor combat with a touch of horrific scenes and story progression on the inside.

This project was inspired by my favorite FPS games growing up including Resident Evil, Phasmophobia, The Forest, and COD: Zombies.

data.short_description: A new FPS survival horror experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 H Series or AMD Ryzen 5 H series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.0 GGz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5 GB Intel Iris Pro 6200 or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
